snippet: Margaret Spellings, who worked for Mr. Bush in the White House and became education secretary, will take over as president of the George W. Bush Foundation in September. She will also direct Mr. Bush’s public policy institute.
abstract: Margaret Spellings, who worked for Mr. Bush in the White House and became education secretary, will take over as president of the George W. Bush Foundation in September. She will also direct Mr. Bush’s public policy institute.

headline.main: Former Bush Adviser Will Head His Foundation
